founder.title: The Founder’s Story
founder.imageAlt: Top view of women joining hands together
founder.p1: We started out as a family business serving retail customers in and around Bornova...
founder.p2: In 2022, led by our founder Ece Samur, we opened one of the largest facilities in the Aegean region...
founder.p3: Today, our biggest goal is to deliver our unique flavors across Turkey while empowering more women...
founder.p4: With our same-day free delivery service within İzmir, we reach our customers quickly and reliably...

vision.title: Vision
vision.body: To place hygiene, quality and trust at the core; work meticulously at every step from production to delivery, and offer flavors our customers can enjoy with complete peace of mind.

mission.title: Mission
mission.body: To become a trusted food brand that is recognized and preferred across Turkey.

items.title: Trust at Every Stage
items.body: From field to table, every step of our journey is carried out with transparent and reliable methods.

items.title: SarMeZ’s Journey
items.body: With years of dedication and experience, we continue leaving a mark on every table.

items.title: Hygiene Meets Tradition
items.body: We blend modern production standards with traditional recipes.

certificates.title: OUR CERTIFICATES
certificates.description: We produce without compromising quality, hygiene, and safety principles. As proof of this approach, the national and international certificates we hold demonstrate that SarMez’s flavors are valued not only on taste but also on trust.
